projects.name: StockBot
projects.description: Uses bs4 and selenium to web-scrape stock trades made by members of congress. These stocks are then placed into a SQL server for analysis

projects.name: Portfolio Website
projects.description: Uses a React app to display my portfolio. Has a searchable table with expandable rows.

projects.name: CS320
projects.description: A collection of the projects I completed in CS320. Major topics include sorting algorithms and graphs

projects.name: CS260
projects.description: A 2d and 3d renderer of computer graphics. Has the ablility to model 3d shapes and complex meshes. Multiple dimmable lights can be used as well as a moveable camera. Uses multiprocessing for faster rendereing.

projects.name: Cookie-Counter
projects.description: A simple counter that uses cookies to save the running count. Uses CSS animations for detail.

projects.name: tic-tac-toe
projects.description: A basic use of React that functions as a Tic-Tac-Toe game. Keeps a history of moves made and can move backwards along the history.

projects.name: produce
projects.description: Uses React to create a table of Produce avaliable. Produce can be filtered using a search bar
